mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" as DbT5101 INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5121ShinseiRirekiJoho" as DbT5121 ON DbT5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5121."shinseishoKanriNo" AND DbT5121."isDeleted" = FALSE INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" as DbT5101Zen ON DbT5121."zenkaiShinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5101Zen."shinseishoKanriNo" AND DbT5101Zen."isDeleted" = FALSE INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM rgdb."DbT5302ShujiiIkenshoJoho" as mst WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT 'x' FROM rgdb."DbT5302ShujiiIkenshoJoho" as slv WHERE mst."isDeleted" = slv."isDeleted" AND mst."shinseishoKanriNo" = slv."shinseishoKanriNo" AND mst."ikenshoIraiRirekiNo" < slv."ikenshoIraiRirekiNo" ) AND mst."isDeleted" = FALSE ) AS DbT5302Zen ON DbT5101Zen."shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5302Zen."shinseishoKanriNo" WHERE DbT5101."shinseishoKanriNo" =#{申請書管理番号} AND DbT5302Zen."shujiiIryoKikanCode" =#{主治医医療機関コード} AND DbT5302Zen."shujiiCode" =#{主治医コード}
SELECT count(*) FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS DbT5101 WHERE DbT5101."shinseishoKanriNo" =#{申請書管理番号} AND DbT5101."shisetsuNyushoFlag" = true
